types.name: Holiday
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations

types.name: Birthday
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use during birthday celebrations

types.name: Environmental
types.description: Fireworks intended for environmental testing by chemists

types.name: Mechanical Demolition
types.description: This type of demolition uses specialized mechanical equipment and tools.

types.name: Total Demolition
types.description: It is the demolition of an entire structure.

types.name: Interior Demolition
types.description: Interior demolition is the taking apart of interior portions of a structure while preserving the exterior, usually in preparation for a renovation project.
